edu.jhu.cs.pl.group18.CurseOfMalphamondConnectionManager

Class ConnectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.jhu.cs.pl.group18.CurseOfMalphamondConnectionManager.ConnectionManager

  • public class ConnectionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides an implementation of the connection manager. The model implementation on the server side should receive and manage messages sended by each client that is playing the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConnectionManager()
      Constructor

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMessenger(Messenger messenger)
      This method registers a new messenger to the connection manager.
      void removeMessenger(Messenger messenger)
      This method removes an existing messenger.

      • ConnectionManager

        public ConnectionManager()
        Constructor

    • Method Detail

      • addMessenger

        public void addMessenger(Messenger messenger)
        This method registers a new messenger to the connection manager. When calling this method, the model proxy will register a player's connection to the model impl on the server side.
        Parameters:
        messenger -

      • removeMessenger

        public void removeMessenger(Messenger messenger)
        This method removes an existing messenger. When a player exit the game, the model Impl will cut off its connection with the player.
        Parameters:
        messenger -
